Review Text: I used these to file at my acrylic nails in the application process and these did me wonders! Also I used this file it off when I’m removing my acrylic and it works perfect!

reference_summary:
COSYMAY 20 inch Human Hair Wig for Women Long Black Wig with Bangs 4x4 Lace Closure Straight Wig Brazilian Virgin Hair Full Wig Average Size 1B COSYMAY {'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Brand': 'COSYMAY', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '9.96 x 6.73 x 2.72 inches; 11.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '738627428647'} [[VIDEOID:9118ad20b0e9a447f9b3a276479f331c]] Wow! This hair is gorgeous! Very nice thickness for a 20 inch and silky to the touch with so much body. The closure is perfect on this wig as well! Just to give you guys an idea of the body of this hair I uploaded videos but excuse me for still having my edges wrapped up lol Silky and Quality Hair! Senegalese Twist Crochet Hair Extensions Ombre-Brown - 32inch 8Packs Synthetic Crochet Braids Pre Looped Crochet Hair Synthetic Braiding Hair (32 inch, T30) ToyoTree {'Package Dimensions': '16.5 x 7.2 x 2.1 inches; 1.6 Pounds', 'UPC': '781827816141'} [[VIDEOID:a3e393606a2e6dcef86b83ecc97fa694]] These are a very nice quality synthetic hair but they are small so I’d you’re going for a more fuller look I suggest getting more but if you’re going to space your crochets quite a bit or do individuals with these you should be okay. Very long too, but it’s great they give you a free gift of the crochet needle and jewels so no need for a store trip! Nice Quality Twist But May Need More Packs! lorelo 20 pieces Hair Curlers, Hair Rollers Spiral Curls Styling Kit No Heat Hair Curlers with Styling Hooks for Girls Woman lorelo {'Number of Items': '20', 'Material': 'Silicone', 'Brand': 'Lorelo', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '10.59 x 9.02 x 2.8 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '619156721396'} Perfect for curling hair the heartless way! The application stick is very long so it can be very useful to long hair types and the application can be adjusted to shorted types by removing a layer. Easy application as well! For application:
-slide hook side first through the roller while it is stretched out
-make sure when you slide it through the hook is showing as well as the bottom of the tool so you can pull it easy off your hair
-hook a small section of your hair (start at the root)
- once your hair is hooked hold the top of the curler gently and the bottom of the tool and gently pull your hair through until the entire hook is out and your hair is covered by the curler.
-and your done! (For best results leave it on overnight if you can!)
Hope this helps anyone! ❤️ Perfect Heatless Curling tool! Nail Powder Vcedas 12 Colors Acrylic Powder Set for Nail UV Gel Powder Dust Design Decoration 3D Manicure Vcedas {'Product Dimensions': '5.91 x 3.94 x 0.79 inches; 6.38 Ounces'} Nice vibrant colors! Very inclusive powder set with so many colors to choose from! Can’t wait to try this on my nails!! You must buy the acrylic liquid and brush applicator separate! Colors are perfect! Nail Files 16 Pcs, Double Sided Emery Board Manicure Tools for Filing Natural Gel and Acrylic Nails for Home and Salon Use Keiby Citom {'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'Keiby Citom', 'Grit Number': '100', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '7.8 x 5.08 x 0.59 inches; 5.29 Ounces', 'UPC': '742025065137', 'Manufacturer': 'YHIT'} I used these to file at my acrylic nails in the application process and these did me wonders! Also I used this file it off when I’m removing my acrylic and it works perfect! Perfect For Natural and Acrylic Nails!
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Type Preference:** Continued strong interest in wigs, particularly long, straight styles with bangs, alongside a growing enthusiasm for crochet hair extensions and a notable focus on nail care products, especially acrylic powders and manicure tools.
- **Quality Expectations:** Maintains high standards for both hair and nail products, prioritizing vibrancy, variety, and quality, with a particular appreciation for functional and effective tools that enhance usability during application processes.
- **Brand Familiarity:** Positive experiences with specific brands in the beauty industry while remaining open to exploring new offerings, particularly in nail supplies, reflecting a dedication to finding the best products available.
- **Visual Engagement:** Actively shares multimedia content (videos and reviews) to communicate satisfaction with products, demonstrating a commitment to community engagement and personal experience sharing for both hair and nail care.
- **Attention to Detail:** Values specific product features and practical applications, as evidenced by recent feedback on tools that contribute to effective nail care and styling, highlighting usability in both hair and nail treatments.
- **User Engagement Style:** Enthusiastic and expressive in providing detailed feedback, sharing personal experiences and offering helpful tips on product usage and enhancements for optimal results.
- **Rating Trends:** Consistently gives positive ratings to products that meet or exceed expectations, underscoring an appreciation for quality, functionality, and aesthetic appeal across both hair and nail products. 

Overall, the user exemplifies a clear preference for high-quality, effective beauty options, accompanied by an active role in knowledge sharing within the beauty community.
